product_name: Good MoleculesTravel Size Hydrating Facial Cleansing Gel
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackGood Molecules Hydrating Facial Cleansing Gel is infused with antioxidant-rich rosewater to gently purify the skin of dirt, oil, and makeup without disrupting its natural moisture balance.
details: DetailsBenefitsCleanse your skin without dryness or tightness, thanks to the pH-balanced, lightly lathering gel formulaKey IngredientsRich in antioxidants, rosewater soothes and helps skin maintain a bright tonePineapple extract gently purifies skin while promoting clarity and softnessItem 2640522How To UseDispense a small amount in palms and massage on the wet face to create a light lather. Rinse off and pat dry. For external use. Avoid eye area.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Propanediol, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Coco-Betaine, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Sodium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Caprylyl Glyceryl Ether, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract.
how_to_use: Dispense a small amount in palms and massage on the wet face to create a light lather. Rinse off and pat dry. For external use. Avoid eye area.

rollup.name: Travel Size Hydrating Facial Cleansing Gel
